koohiiStory1: If you focus the suns though a magnifying glass on to the bottom of a stalk of wheat it will start to smoulder and burn like a stick of incense. The weird thing is that it burns from the bottom upwards, hanging in the air as if my magic. Try it and see!
koohiiStory2: When the sun burns the wheat a smell of incense remains in the air.
myStory: chữ Hương. mùi lúa ban ngày.
readingExamples: 香水 (こうすい), 香気 (こうき), 線香 (せんこう), 香 (か), 香り (かお.り), 香る (かお.る)
